org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.cfg

Interface ConfigurationSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeConfigurationSource, InputStreamConfigurationSource, PropertiesConfigurationSource

    public interface ConfigurationSource
    This interface provides an abstraction of a Configuration Source in Kiln

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(String path, Class<T> clz)
      Retrieve the configuration given a path '/' separated and the data type (class) expected of the configuration type
      <T> T get(String path, Class<T> clz, T defaultVal)
      Retrieve the configuration given a path '/' separated and the data type (class) expected of the configuration type.
      boolean isValid(String path)
      Checks whether the given path is valid within the context of the configuration source

    • Method Detail

      • get

        <T> T get(String path,
          Class<T> clz)
   throws ConfigurationException
        Retrieve the configuration given a path '/' separated and the data type (class) expected of the configuration type
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected data type of the Configuraion information
        Parameters:
        path - A '/' separated path to the configuration
        clz - The Class of the configuration information
        Returns:
        The configuration if the path and type is valid.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - If the path or type is invalid.

      • get

        <T> T get(String path,
          Class<T> clz,
          T defaultVal)
        Retrieve the configuration given a path '/' separated and the data type (class) expected of the configuration type. If the configuration is not available the given default will be returned
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected data type of the Configuraion information
        Parameters:
        path - A '/' separated path to the configuration
        clz - The Class of the configuration information
        defaultVal - The default value to be returned in the absence of the configuration
        Returns:
        The configuration if the path and type is valid. If not the default value is returned

      • isValid

        boolean isValid(String path)
        Checks whether the given path is valid within the context of the configuration source
        Parameters:
        path - A '/' separated path to the configuration
        Returns:
        'True' if the path is valid, 'False' otherwise
